sentence: Inter Parfums, Inc. ( IPAR ) will begin trading ex-dividend on June 28, 2017.
A cash dividend payment of $0.17 per share is scheduled to be paid on July 14, 2017.
Shareholders who purchased IPAR prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 3rd quarter that IPAR has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $37.05, the dividend yield is 1.84%.
The previous trading day's last sale of IPAR was $37.05, representing a -11.15% decrease from the 52 week high of $41.70 and a 36.97% increase over the 52 week low of $27.05.
IPAR is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
IPAR's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $1.27.
Zacks Investment Research reports IPAR's forecasted earnings growth in 2017 as 10.7%, compared to an industry average of 2.8%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the IPAR Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
